title: Create flashcards — flashcard
text: x Name pre-existing flashcard deck path name CSV file containing terms descriptions termsfirst Logical indicating whether show terms first (TRUE) descriptions first (FALSE) package Logical indicating whether include package name term theme Name reveal.js theme use flashcards file Path file name used save flashcard deck locally (must save HTML) fontsize Base font size presentation. Acceptable values include "default" (500%), "large" (700%), "small" (300%). Custom values can set percentages (e.g., "250%"). use_browser Logical indicating whether show presentation RStudio viewer available (FALSE) system's default browser (TRUE)
